name: Professor Layton and the Miracle Mask™
description: The Professor Layton and the Miracle Mask™ game is the 5th installment in the series, and the first one for the Nintendo 3DS™ system. Dive into a vibrant world filled with delightful puzzles and mind-bending intrigue! When Professor Layton travels to the festive city of Monte d’Or to investigate a series of terrifying incidents, he must search his past in order to stop a shadowy villain. Master the clues & puzzles to find the truth that lurks behind the mystery of the Masked Gentleman! If that’s not enough, you will be able to download an additional puzzle each day for a year* ! *Availability starts upon game launch (10/28/2012). A wireless internet connection is required to download puzzles. Maximum of 365 downloadable puzzles. The number of puzzles available per download depends on how often the download library is accessed (for example, if you connect once a week, you will download 7 puzzles at once.)
